Player History
Injured on 8/17/1982 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 6 days...
Traded from Toledo to Pittsburgh on 1/31/1983 (Going to PIT: 3B L. Gothard, P G. Hutto. Going to TOL: 3B G. Freeman, P E. Harris)...
Injured on 7/24/1983 with a Hyper Extended Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Earned first career win on 4/6/1984...
Injured on 4/29/1984 with a Pulled Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 8 weeks...
Had first career hit on 7/22/1984, off Fred Myers (NE)...
Won World Championship with Pittsburgh in 1986...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/1989, going 5-0, 1.09...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Injured on 9/20/1989 with a Fractured Hand, out for 4-5 weeks...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 8/1/1991, going 6-0, 1.86...
Won World Championship with Pittsburgh in 1991...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/1/1992, winning 2 games with a 1.04 ERA...
